Title: Aha!

Actors: Sathi Yasmin, Humayun Faridi, Tariq Anam Khan, Ferdous Ahmed
Plot: Mr. Rafiq is given an option to develop the ancestral property by a privet developer agent. The house carries the style of typical historic buildings of old Dhaka; which are being pushed ...
